name: OreLocalization.nonempty_oreSet_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : Ring R
S : Submonoid R
⊢ Iff (Nonempty (OreLocalization.OreSet S)) (And (∀ (r₁ r₂ : R) (s : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem S x), Eq (HMul.hMul r₁ ↑s) (HMul.hMul r₂ ↑s) → Exists fun s' => Eq (HMul.hMul (↑s') r₁) (HMul.hMul (↑s') r₂)) (∀ (r : R) (s : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem S x), Exists fun r' => Exists fun s' => Eq (HMul.hMul (↑s') r) (HMul.hMul r' ↑s)))
decl:
lemma nonempty_oreSet_iff {R : Type*} [Ring R] {S : Submonoid R} :
    Nonempty (OreSet S) ↔ (∀ (r₁ r₂ : R) (s : S), r₁ * s = r₂ * s → ∃ s' : S, s' * r₁ = s' * r₂) ∧
      (∀ (r : R) (s : S), ∃ (r' : R) (s' : S), s' * r = r' * s) := by
  constructor
  · exact fun ⟨_⟩ ↦ ⟨ore_right_cancel, fun r s ↦ ⟨oreNum r s, oreDenom r s, ore_eq r s⟩⟩
  · intro ⟨H, H'⟩
    choose r' s' h using H'
    exact ⟨H, r', s', h⟩

name: OreLocalization.nonempty_oreSet_iff_of_noZeroDivisors
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Ring R
inst✝ : NoZeroDivisors R
S : Submonoid R
⊢ Iff (Nonempty (OreLocalization.OreSet S)) (∀ (r : R) (s : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem S x), Exists fun r' => Exists fun s' => Eq (HMul.hMul (↑s') r) (HMul.hMul r' ↑s))
decl:
lemma nonempty_oreSet_iff_of_noZeroDivisors {R : Type*} [Ring R] [NoZeroDivisors R]
    {S : Submonoid R} :
    Nonempty (OreSet S) ↔ ∀ (r : R) (s : S), ∃ (r' : R) (s' : S), s' * r = r' * s := by
  constructor
  · exact fun ⟨_⟩ ↦ fun r s ↦ ⟨oreNum r s, oreDenom r s, ore_eq r s⟩
  · intro H
    choose r' s' h using H
    exact ⟨oreSetOfNoZeroDivisors r' s' h⟩
